mapper.insert: /* sql : PostRepository.save */ INSERT INTO TB_POST ( POST_ID, BOARD_ID, POST_TITLE, MAIN_TEXT, CREATED_ID, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_ID, UPDATED_AT ) VALUES ( 'PT'||LPAD(nextval('SEQ_POST')||'', 8, '0'), #{board_id}, #{post_title}, #{main_text}, #{created_id}, now(), #{created_id}, now() )
mapper.select: /* sql : PostRepository.findByPostId */ SELECT A.POST_ID, A.BOARD_ID, A.POST_TITLE, A.CREATED_ID, A.USE_YN, FN_GETCODENM('USE_YN', A.USE_YN) AS USE_YN_NM, B.BOARD_TITLE, TO_CHAR(A.CREATED_AT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS CREATED_AT, FN_GETUSERNM(A.CREATED_ID) AS CREATED_NM, FN_GETCODENM('BOARD_TYPE', B.BOARD_TYPE) AS BOARD_TYPE_NM, A.MAIN_TEXT, A.VIEW_CNT FROM TB_POST A, TB_BOARD B WHERE A.BOARD_ID = B.BOARD_ID AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' and A.POST_ID = #{post_id}
